::Slayer::

Slayer frowns. "You're right. They wouldn't do much good in a fight."

He looks over the items they still needed. "I guess its back to our 
old plan, although the Maximals would probably be careful so it might 
not work."




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Ignatius thinks over the possabilities for a moment. "One strategic 
problem
> though. According to the comms they've taken quite a bit of damage. 
It would
> take alot to get them to attack anyone right now." He thinks back 
to Slayers
> last meeting with the Maximals. "Last time you visited the Maximals 
it cost
> you an arm and a leg to escape. Well a leg at least. I don't think 
they'd
> welcome us with open arms." Ignatius' reasons were governed as much 
by fear
> as logic, he knew that it would do Prebon, Blaze, and Bullet no 
good to get
> themselves slagged.
